::Hot Rod::

He made his way in to the base.(The lockdown wasn'r complete right?)
He went to his room. His thought, 'Darn, so much for that. I wounder if
Zardus heard. I guess I stay here.'

::DrillBit::

He ran to the pod with Diamond.
"Got my own method. Beast mode!" 
He transformed to beetle mode.
"Drill, max power."
He started drilling through thr ground.

::Demolition::

He saw the energy ball.
"Vehical mode!"
He transformed to jet mode, and bagan terring up the ground with
bullets. The berage finally was streight for Angel Prime.
